title: RPGItems如何制作护甲
author: 茶籽Tea
txt_content: RPGItems我试了用/RPGitem 名字 Create ，但是/RPGitem 名字 item 护甲ID后护甲只有0耐久，求解决

replies.author: Tds...
replies.txt_content:
茶籽Tea 发表于 2019-8-6 20:51
你可以试试/rpgitem name item id:damage

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: zjyz11
replies.txt_content: 为何不选用mm插件或者sx插件呢

replies.author: 茶籽Tea
replies.txt_content:
世予 发表于 2019-8-6 20:27
/rpgitem XX durability [耐久] 设置耐久
耐久变了就消失了

replies.author: 茶籽Tea
replies.txt_content:
世予 发表于 2019-8-6 20:27
/rpgitem XX durability [耐久] 设置耐久
刚开始他是0/240的锁链盔甲，改了就没了

replies.author: 茶籽Tea
replies.txt_content:
世予 发表于 2019-8-6 20:27
/rpgitem XX durability [耐久] 设置耐久
